p:
Over the last two decades, non-fused pyridazine nucleus has emerged as an important class of heterocycles that represents a promising and privileged scaffold in medicinal chemistry
10 . Literature survey revealed that plenty of pyridazine-based small molecules have been extensively investigated for a broad array of significant biological actions, such as anti-inflammatory
11
,
12 , anti-hypertensive
13 , anti-diabetic
14 , anti-obesity
15 , neuroprotective
16 , anti-Alzheimerâ€™s
17 , anti-tubercular
18 , anti-HIV
19 and anticancer
20 activities.
